==English== [[File:Britannica Macropaedia.jpg|thumb|right|250px|Volumes 21–24 of ''Britannica'''s ''[[w:Macropædia|Macropædia]]'' (covering topics from ''India'' to ''Norway'') in the [[w:Deutsches Museum|Deutsches Museum]]'s library.]]
[[File:Göttingen-SUB-Encyclopedia.Americana.JPG|thumb|right|250px|Volumes 5–12 of the ''Encyclopedia Americana'' (covering topics from ''Bulgaria'' to ''Goethals'') in the SUB Library at the University of Göttingen, Germany.]]
